attributes.review: The entire app is bs. I downloaded it to be a part of something bigger but it only confirmed the absolute worst. The president is idiotic for having this app developed. Such a disappointing app!
attributes.title: F***ing awful

attributes.review: tik tok tik tok tik tok tik tok tik tok
attributes.title: GEN Z FOR THE WIN

attributes.review: So I downloaded this app because I wanted to show my support for our favorite orange but it didn’t work how I thought it would. I assumed I would get to send a message directly to the Oompa Loompa, but it just told me to text Trump to 88022 to show my support. I cried myself to sleep that night. When I woke up the next morning, I heard the doorbell ring and someone start yelling. I looked out the window, and who did I see but our Lord Cheeto himself, President Trump! He walked through my door into my house and told me he was there to grant me a wish, so I told him that my one wish was a day at the White House. He responded by yelling at me and telling me to hop away, then proceeded to take my phone and throw it across the room. He then began urinating on my floor, followed by him throwing trash inside my house and breaking through the wall in order to leave. An extreme disappointment, definitely don’t downloadpleasenoticemesenpaitrump.
attributes.title: PRAISE LORD CHEETO

attributes.review: I downloaded because my grandma is unfortunately a majorrrr trump supporter and forced me. I downloaded it and it hacked my entire phone and now everything on my phone is all trump themed. My apps all look like him. The police are outside or my house along with those Mickey Instagram accounts. 100000/10 DO NOT RECOMMEND unless you want the government to have all your data and information and blackmail you into voting for trump 😭😖
attributes.title: WORST APP ❤️👺

attributes.review: i genuinely downloaded this app to get the newest information in our president and know how everything would be going down this election. the app takes up so much room and wastes a lot of battery. it also attracts crazy’s. if you use it in public (disclaimer: DONT) it will attract people who are white supremacists and they will want to hurt you!!! don’t download it. it doesn’t help it just makes things worse. i couldn’t sleep at night. i couldn’t poop for 4 days!! a horrible horrible thing and it all happened due to the downloading of this app.
attributes.title: bad bad app

attributes.review: I can not explain how horrible this app is. It’s teaching kids horrible morals and as a loving parent I think it’s disgusting. It was giving me spam stuff and went to inappropriate sites. I am a trump supporter but I don’t support this app and needs to be gone for good.THANKS FOR YOUR TIME GOODBYE
attributes.title: Needs to be gone

attributes.review: This app took 3 weeks to download and it started saying weird words in code! 🙀 This app stole ALL of my information and has started to mail me random items such as a shoe 😾. In conclusion DONT DOWNLOAD THIS APP 🤮😿🥱🤧😤
attributes.title: DO NOT DOWNLOAD

attributes.review:
I got this app because I LOOOOOOVE *insert sarcasm here* our orange, Cheeto, president, who is afraid of women, but everything was horrible (even his leading). It kept crashing, sending me links to 𝙨𝙘𝙖𝙢𝙨, there was a picture of a rapist (Ahem TRUMP with his dirty looking ass). ❥𓆉❥✞♥︎シ♥︎シఌ㋛㋛ఌ𓁹❥☀︎︎❥シ❣︎☀︎︎♥︎✞✔︎✞❣︎✞㋛☦︎︎✔︎⌫シ❥❥❦✞❣︎シ♥︎✞✔︎☀︎︎ఌ☀︎︎✞❣︎❥☀︎︎☾シ❥☹︎❥☀︎︎ఌシ❣︎☀︎︎ 𝑆𝑖𝑛𝑐𝑒 𝑇𝑟𝑢𝑚𝑜 𝑤𝑎𝑛𝑡𝑒𝑑 𝑡𝑜 𝑏𝑎𝑛 𝑡𝑖𝑘𝑡𝑜𝑘 𝑖𝑚𝑚𝑎 𝑡𝑎𝑘𝑒 𝑑𝑜𝑤𝑛 ℎ𝑖𝑠 𝑎𝑝𝑝.
